title: West Bank Residents Survey Destruction as Israeli Forces Withdraw
content: A 10-day raid by Israeli troops into the occupied territory has been one of the most devastating in years, with at least 39 people killed, according to Palestinian officials.
summary: A 10-day raid by Israeli troops into the occupied territory has been one of the most devastating in years, with at least 39 people killed, according to Palestinian officials.

title: In Papua New Guinea, Pope Hears Plea for Climate Action
content: Pope Francis is visiting Papua New Guinea, which has been exploited for its natural resources and is imperiled by rising sea levels.

title: Tony Blair’s Advice on Leadership: Tend to Your Legacy

title: Typhoon Yagi Makes Landfall in Vietnam After Pounding Southern China
content: Yagi was one of the strongest storms to hit northern Vietnam, where one person died, thousands were evacuated, and flood and landslide warnings were issued.

title: Street Artist Documents War in Ukraine, One Stark Mural at a Time
content: Using ruins as his canvas, Gamlet Zinkivskyi has captured life in wartime Ukraine in dozens of grim, gripping and harshly beautiful paintings. “Broken, but invincible,” read one captioned work.
summary: Using ruins as his canvas, Gamlet Zinkivskyi has captured life in wartime Ukraine in dozens of grim, gripping and harshly beautiful paintings. “Broken, but invincible,” read one captioned work.

title: The Pivotal Decision That Led to a Resurgence of Polio
